io.ktor.application

接口 ApplicationEnvironment


  • public ApplicationEnvironment

    Represents an environment in which class Application runs

    另请参阅:
    class Application

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 默认方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      java.lang.ClassLoader getClassLoader()
      ClassLoader used to load application.
      ApplicationConfig getConfig()
      Configuration for the class Application
      org.slf4j.Logger getLog()
      Instance of Logger to be used for logging.
      ApplicationEvents getMonitor()
      Provides events on Application lifecycle

    • 方法详细资料

      • getClassLoader

        java.lang.ClassLoader getClassLoader()

        ClassLoader used to load application.

        Useful for various reflection-based services, like dependency injection.

      • getLog

        org.slf4j.Logger getLog()

        Instance of Logger to be used for logging.

      • getConfig

        ApplicationConfig getConfig()

        Configuration for the class Application

        另请参阅:
        class Application

      • getMonitor

        ApplicationEvents getMonitor()

        Provides events on Application lifecycle
